data.title: Fantastic Place!
data.text: What a wonderful find in downtown Lynchburg! Christina and Jason love their business and it shows!  From the beautiful set up of the shop to the amazing selection of olive oils and  balsamic vinegars, this is a place not to miss. My favorites so far are the Blackberry Balsamic Vinegar (which is also great on popcorn) and the Butter flavored Olive Oil. Support a local business and get to downtown Lynchburg!

owner_response.author: Christina L, Owner at Favored Flavors - Tasting Shop & Little Bistro, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for the lovely review, we really appreciate it!  Hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Unique and Fun Shop
data.text: This is such a neat little shop! My husband and I were were walking around downtown when we just happened upon it. We went inside and started to taste their flavored olive oils and balsamic vinegars. Absolutely everything we tried was delicious. We ended up buying 4 bottles of vinegar to give away as Christmas gifts. We will definitely return! I could buy one of everything in the store.

owner_response.author: Christina L, Owner at Favored Flavors - Tasting Shop & Little Bistro, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi Shadow_Wanderer, I apologize for not responding sooner but I didn't realize that our shop had been listed on tripadvisor until today.  Thank you so much for the lovely review, we really appreciate it and look forward to your return!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
